arts.ttl: Ex Juventus & Inter Milan Winger Predicts Derby D’Italia Serie A Clash: “Inter The Strongest But Juve Are Juve”
arts.sum: Former Juventus and Inter Milan winger Juan Cuadrado has claimed “Inter are the strongest” ahead of Saturday’s Derby d’Italia, but “Juve are Juve.” Speaking in an interview with the Gazzetta dello Sport, Cuadrado recalled his spells with both clubs and revealed his thoughts on the upcoming match. arts.ttl: Revealed – Juventus vs Inter Milan Referee Previous Matches in Charge Of Nerazzurri Serie A Matches
arts.sum: Andrea Colombo will be the referee for Saturday’s Derby d’Italia clash between Juventus and Inter Milan. The 34-year-old referee from Como will take charge of his eighth Inter match, with six of the previous seven ending in victory for the Nerazzurri. arts.ttl: Juventus vs Inter Milan – Chivu & Tudor Head To Head Record Favours Nerazzurri Coach
arts.sum: Saturday’s Derby d’Italia between Juventus and Inter Milan will be just the second time Igor Tudor and Cristian Chivu have faced off as coaches but the Romanian had the better record as a player. Chivu led his Parma side to an impressive 1-0 victory over Juventus in April and will be hoping to rely on […] The post Juventus vs Inter Milan – Chivu & Tudor Head To Head Record Favours Nerazzurri Coach appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: Ex Inter Milan Striker Tips Juventus In Scudetto Race – Criticizes Nerazzurri’s Transfer Window: “Not Right Names Signed”
arts.sum: Former Inter Milan forward Aldo Serena has criticised the Nerazzurri’s summer transfer window and says Juventus hold the edge in the Scudetto race, ahead of Saturday’s Derby d’Italia clash between the two sides. arts.ttl: Cristian Chivu Turns To Experienced Stars For Derby D’Italia Edge In Juventus Vs Inter Milan Clash
arts.sum: Inter Milan head coach Cristian Chivu will utilise his experienced squad to gain an edge over Juventus in Saturday’s Derby d’Italia clash. Inter’s average age is 27.9, compared to Juventus’ 26.1, according to Italian newspaper Tuttosport. Chivu will be hopeful that the Nerazzurri’s experience can lead them to victory over their rivals. It is not […] The post Cristian Chivu Turns To Experienced Stars For Derby D’Italia Edge In Juventus Vs Inter Milan Clash appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: Predicted Lineups – Francisco Conceicao To Miss Juventus vs Inter Milan Serie A Derby D’Italia Clash
arts.sum: Juventus winger Francisco Conceicao is set to miss Saturday’s Derby d’Italia clash against Inter Milan. According to today’s edition of the Gazzetta dello Sport, Teun Koopmeiners will step into the Bianconeri team. This comes after Conceicao suffered a muscle injury on international duty with Portugal that led him to return to Turin early.
